Machine Learning / Data Analytics



The projects are related to machine learning and data analytics to solve problems in S.LSI division, Samsung Electronics.


Table of Contents

  • 1. Reinforcement Learning for Resource Management
  • 2. Simulation Log Analytics for Testcase Similarity



1. Reinforcement Learning for Resource Management


Description

The goal of this project was to maximize SoC/IP emulation resource utilization with reinforcement learning. The heuristic based approach improved resource utilization (SoC Verfication), however, environments were too diverse to define a fixed algorithm. Double Deep Q Network (DDQN), which is one of the basic algorithm by DeepMind, was applied to solve this problem.

My role was to develop a training environment and find an appropriate DDQN model through training. The training data was collected from previous dataset in Oracle DB. The test result showed that DDQN algorithm had better performance than random policy and no policy.


Skills

Python
Oracle PL/SQL
Reinforcement Learning
DDQN
Keras
PyQT
Pandas

Seaborn

2. NLP for Testcase Similarity


Description

The goal of this project was to find out meaningful information from hundreds TBs of simulation log data, which was mostly discarded after simulation.

My role was to set up distributed databases and store simulation log data. I also analyzed log data with Natural Language Processing (NLP) technique, such as Word2Vec and Spacy. T-SNE was used to find out the vector distance between each simulation log
.
As a result, meaningful similarity was found in each log, which was not demonstrated in user-defined features.


Skills

Python
Word2Vec
Spacy
T-SNE
Juypter


Period

2 months

  • 24 Aug
    2020

  • 31 Oct
    2020
